Account.name: Account
Account.description: Standard and custom fields extend the standard Account object for use          in Consumer Goods Cloud to represent an individual account, which is an company or person          involved with your business, such as customers, competitors, and partners.

AccountNumber.description: Account number assigned to the account (not the unique,                       auto-generated ID assigned during creation). Can have up to 40                       characters.

AnnualRevenue.description: Estimated annual revenue of the account.

BillingAddress.description: Compound form of the billing address. Read-only. See Address Compound Fields                       for details on compound address fields.

BillingCity.description: Details for the billing address of the account. Can have up to 40                       characters.

BillingCountry.description: Details for the billing address of the account. Can have up to 80                       characters.

BillingGeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the billing address:

BillingLatitude.description: Used with BillingLongitude to specify the precise geolocation of a                       billing address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90,                       up to 15 decimal places. See Compound Field Considerations and                          Limitations for details on geolocation compound                       fields.

BillingLongitude.description: Used with BillingLatitude to specify the precise geolocation of a                       billing address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and                       180, up to 15 decimal places. See Compound Field Considerations and                          Limitations for details on geolocation compound                       fields.

BillingPostalCode.description: Details for the billing address of the account. Can have up to 20                       characters.

BillingState.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Can have up to 80                       characters.

BillingStreet.description: Street name in the billing address of the account.

CleanStatus.description: Indicates the record’s clean status compared with Data.com:

DandbCompanyId.description: ID of the Dun & Bradstreet® company record associated with the                       account.

Description.description: Text description of the account. Limited to 32,000 KB.

DunsNumber.description: The Data Universal Numbering System (D-U-N-S) number is a unique,                       nine-digit number assigned to every business location in the Dun                       & Bradstreet database that has a unique, separate, and distinct                       operation. D-U-N-S numbers are used by industries and organizations                       around the world as a global standard for business identification                       and tracking. Maximum size is nine characters. This field is                       available only on business accounts.   Note This field is available                          only to companies that use Data.com Prospector or Data.com                          Clean.

Industry.description: Industry associated with the account. Can have up to 40                       characters.

Jigsaw.description: References the ID of a company in Data.com. Accounts imported from                       Data.com always have a value in this field, while accounts not                       imported from Data.com have a null value. Can have up to 20 characters. Available in                       API version 22.0 and later. Label is Data.com Key. This field is                       available only on business accounts.

JigsawCompanyId.description: ID of a company in Data.com.

LastActivityDate.description: Date when a user last modified the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MasterRecordId.description: If this object was deleted as the result of a merge, then this                       field contains the ID of the record that was kept. If this object                       was deleted for any other reason, or hasn’t been deleted, the value                       is null.

NaicsCode.description: The six-digit North American Industry Classification System                       (NAICS) code is the standard used by businesses and the government                       to classify business establishments into industries, according to                       their economic activity for the purpose of collecting, analyzing,                       and publishing statistical data related to the U.S. business                       economy. Can have up to eight characters. This field is available                       only on business accounts.   Note This field is available only to                          companies that use Data.com Prospector or Data.com Clean.

NaicsDesc.description: Brief description of an company line of business based on the                       org’s NAICS code. Can have up to 120 characters. The field is                       available only on business accounts.   Note The field is available                          only to companies that use Data.com Prospector or Data.com                          Clean.

NumberOfEmployees.description: Number of employees working at the company that’s represented by                       the account. Can have up to eight digits.

OperatingHoursId.description: Operating hours associated with the account. Available only if                       Field Service is enabled.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who currently owns the account. Default value is                       the user logged in to the API to perform the create. If you have                       set up account teams in your company, the result of updating this                       field depends on your version of the API:

ParentId.description: ID of the parent object, if any.

Phone.description: Phone number of the account. Can have up to 40 characters.

PhotoUrl.description: Path to be combined with the URL of a Salesforce instance (for                       example, https://yourInstance.salesforce.com/) to generate a URL to                       request the social network profile image associated with the                       account. Generated URL returns an HTTP redirect (code 302) to the                       social network profile image for the account. Returns a blank if                       Social Accounts and Contacts aren’t enabled for the company or are                       disabled for the requesting user.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type assigned to the object.

ShippingAddress.description: Read-only. Compound form of the shipping address. See Address Compound Fields                       for details on compound address fields.

ShippingCity.description: City in the shipping address of the account. Can have up to 40                       characters.

ShippingCountry.description: Country in the shipping address of the account. Can have up to 80                       characters.

ShippingGeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the shipping address:

ShippingLatitude.description: Used with ShippingLongitude to specify the precise geolocation of                       a shipping address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and                       90, up to 15 decimal places. See Compound Field Considerations and                          Limitations for details on geolocation compound                       fields.

ShippingLongitude.description: Used with ShippingLatitude to specify the precise geolocation of                       an address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180, up                       to 15 decimal places. See Compound Field Considerations and                          Limitations for details on geolocation compound                       fields.

ShippingPostalCode.description: Postal code in the shipping address of the account. Can have up to                       20 characters.

ShippingState.description: State in the shipping address of the account. Can have up to 80                       characters.

ShippingStreet.description: Street name in the shipping address of the account. Can have up to                       255 characters.

Sic.description: Standard Industrial Classification code of the company’s main                       business categorization. For example, 57340 for Electronics. Can                       have up to 20 characters. This field is available only on business                       accounts.

SicDesc.description: Brief description of an company line of business, based on the SIC                       code. Can have up to 80 characters. This field is available only on                       business accounts.

Site.description: Name of the account’s location. For example, Headquarters or                       London. Can have up to 80 characters.

TickerSymbol.description: Stock market symbol for the account. Can have up to 20 characters.                       This field is available only on business accounts.

Tradestyle.description: Non-legal name that an company uses for conducting business.                       Similar to Doing business as or DBA. Can have up to                       255 characters. This field is available only on business accounts.                            Note This field is available only to companies that use                          Data.com Prospector or Data.com Clean.

Website.description: Website of the account. Can have up to 255 characters.

YearStarted.description: Date when an org was legally established. Can have up to four                       characters.   Note This field is only available to organizations                          that use Data.com Prospector or Data.com Clean.

cgcloud_Account_Email__c.description: Email address of the account. Label is Email.

cgcloud_Account_Number__c.description: Account number assigned to the account (not the unique,                       auto-generated ID assigned during creation). Can have up to 40                       characters.

cgcloud_Account_Template__c.description: References the account template object used for accounts.

cgcloud__ExternalId__c.description: Unique identifier of the external object record to account.

cgcloud__Number_Of_Extensions__c.description: Number of extensions for the account.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org of the template.

AiVisitTaskRcmd.name: AiVisitTaskRcmd
AiVisitTaskRcmd.description: Represents the visit task recommendations. These recommendations can be       accepted or rejected by a sales manager.

AiVisitTaskRcmdRequestId.description: ID of the visit task recommendation request associated with this            record.

IsLatest.description: Indicates if the recommendation is the latest recommendation.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last referenced a record related to            this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the visit task recommendation.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user associated with this record.

RecommendationDecisionComment.description: Details about why a recommendation was accepted or rejected.

RecommendationReason.description: Details about why this task or KPI is recommended.

RuleScore.description: The score provided by the recommendation strategy.

TargetRecordId.description: The target record for which this recommendation is requested.

TargetRecordObjectName.description: The type of targets for which activities are recommended.

TemplateRecordId.description: The link to the record used as a template.

TemplateRecordObjectName.description: The object name of the template record.

AiVisitTaskRcmdRequest.name: AiVisitTaskRcmdRequest
AiVisitTaskRcmdRequest.description: Represents the request parameters and responses of visit task recommendations.

AcceptedCount.description: Number of recommendations created by this recommendation request that are            accepted.

ErrorMessage.description: Details of why the visit task recommendations weren't generated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last            referenced            a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The            timestamp for when the current user last viewed this            record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user associated with this record.

RecommendationCount.description: Number of recommendations created for the request.

RecommendationStrategyName.description: Name of the visit recommendation strategy.

RejectedCount.description: Number of recommendations created by this recommendation request that are            rejected.

Status.description: Status of the visit task recommendation            request.            The default value is QUEUED.

TargetRecordList.description: List of targets for which recommendations are required.

TargetRecordObjectName.description: The type of targets for which activities are recommended.

AssessmentIndDefinedValue.name: AssessmentIndDefinedValue
AssessmentIndDefinedValue.description: Stores the list of acceptable values which are defined as part of assessment       indicator definition for a single and multi select question.

AssessmentIndicatorDefinitionId.description: ID of the associated assessment indicator definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this            record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence in which the assessment indicator value is displayed in the            UI.

Value.description: Values for the assessment indicator definition.

AssessmentIndicatorDefinition.name: AssessmentIndicatorDefinition
AssessmentIndicatorDefinition.description: Define parameters that act as markers of compliance for retail tasks to compare       target and actual values.

DataType.description: Type of data the assessment Indicator definition can hold.

Description.description: Description of the assessment indicator definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the assessment indicator definition that indicates the parameter            to audit. Values can include: Inventory, Facings, Competitor Facings, Share of            Shelf.

OwnerId.description: ID of the assessment Indicator definition record owner.

AssessmentIndValue.name: AssessmentIndValue
AssessmentIndValue.description: Stores the list of target or captured values which are defined as part of       assessment indicator definition for a single and multi select question.

AssessmentIndDefinedValueId.description: Id of the associated assessment indicator definition value.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this            record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the assessment indicator definition value record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this record.

AssessmentTask.name: AssessmentTask
AssessmentTask.description: Perform activities such as planogram check, inventory check, promotion check,       in-store survey, or custom task in stores to capture information.

AssessmentTaskDefinition.description: The assessment task definition that is referenced for the task. This field            is available in API version 48.0 and later.

Description.description: Description of task that has to be performed at the store.

EndTime.description: Time when the task is completed by a field rep. This field is available in            API version 49.0 and later.

IsRequired.description: Indicate whether a task must be completed to complete a visit. The default            value is False. This field is available in API version 48.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the assessment task record owner.

ParentId.description: The visit associated with an assessment task.This field is available in API            version 48.0 and later.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence in which the tasks must be performed. This field is available            in API version 48.0 and later.

StartTime.description: Time when the task is started by a field rep. This field is available in API            version 49.0 and later.

Status.description: View the status of a task. This field is available in API version 48.0 and            later.

TaskDefinitionId.description: Reference to related records such as signature task, delivery task, other            Component task, flow, and SFDC task. This field is a polymorphic              relationship field. This field is available in API version 48.0 and              later.

TaskType.description: Type of a task that the sales rep can perform during the visit. The task            type must match the task type of the assessment task definition.

AssessmentTaskContentDocument.name: AssessmentTaskContentDocument
AssessmentTaskContentDocument.description: Associate content documents to visits, tasks, promotions, or planograms.

ContentContextId.description: ID of the attachment or file used as the content document for a custom            object that is associated with a task. The IDs are validated against            ActionPlanTemplateType.

ContentDocumentId.description: ID of the attachment or file used as the content document.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier of the content document.

AssessmentTaskDefinition.name: AssessmentTaskDefinition
AssessmentTaskDefinition.description: Associate an assessment task with an assessment indicator definition.

Description.description: Description of the assessment task definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the assessment Indicator definition record owner.

TaskType.description: Type of a task that the sales rep can perform during the visit.

AssessmentTaskIndDefinition.name: AssessmentTaskIndDefinition
AssessmentTaskIndDefinition.description: Associate an assessment indicator definition with an assessment task       definition.

AssessmentIndDefinitionI.description: The assessment indicator definition that is associated with the assessment            task.

AssessmentTaskDefinition.description: The assessment task that is associated with the assessment indicator            definition.

DisplayOrder.description: Sequence of the assessment task definitions.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identification of the assessment task indicator definition.

AssessmentTaskOrder.name: AssessmentTaskOrder
AssessmentTaskOrder.description: Define an order activity that the sales rep can perform during a visit to the       stores.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the assessment Indicator definition for the order            creation task.

Asset.name: Asset
Asset.description: Standard and custom fields extend the standard Asset object in          Consumer Goods Cloud to represent an item of commercial value, such as a product sold by          your company or a competitor, that a customer has purchased.

AccountId.description: Required. ID of the Account related to the asset. Must be a valid                       account ID.

Address.description: The compound form of the Asset address

AssetLevel.description: Asset’s position in the asset hierarchy: Assets that have no                       parent or child assets, or that belong to a hierarchy have a level                       of 1 for the root asset. Child assets of the root asset have a                       level of 2, the children of level 2 assets have a level of 3, and                       so on.   Note The asset level of assets created before the                          introduction of this field defaults to –1. After the asset                          record is updated, the asset level is calculated and                          automatically updated.

AssetProvidedById.description: Account that provided the asset, typically a manufacturer.

AssetServicedById.description: Account in charge of servicing the asset.

ContactId.description: ID of the related contact record.

CurrentLifecycleEndDate.description: End of the period shown as current. Auto-populated field inherited                       from the end date of the current asset state period. If the field                       is empty, as with an evergreen subscription, the Current Lifecycle                       End Date field is empty.

CurrentMrr.description: Asset’s monthly recurring revenue during the current asset state                       period. Auto-populated field inherited from the monthly recurring                       revenue on the current asset state period. If no asset state period                       is current, the value is 0. Label is Current Monthly Recurring                       Revenue.

CurrentQuantity.description: Asset’s quantity during the current asset state period.                       Auto-populated field inherited from the quantity on the current                       asset state period. If no asset state period is current, the value                       is 0.

HasLifecycleManagement.description: Indicates whether this asset is lifecycle-managed (true) or not (false). After setting this value,                       the value can’t be changed. Auto-populated field.

InstallDate.description: Date when the asset was installed.

IsCompetitorProduct.description: Indicates whether the asset represents a product sold by a                       competitor (true) or not                          (false).

IsInternal.description: Indicates whether the asset is produced or used internally                          (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Date and time that the asset was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and time that the asset was last viewed.

LifecycleEndDate.description: End of the asset’s lifecycle. Auto-populated field inherited from                       the end date of the final asset state period. If the field is                       empty, as with an evergreen subscription, the lifecycle has no end                       date. This field is available when CPQ Plus, Salesforce Billing, or                       Subscription Management is enabled.

LifecycleStartDate.description: Beginning of the asset’s lifecycle. Auto-populated field inherited                       from the start date of the earliest asset state period. This field                       can’t be edited. When a new asset action affects the start date of                       an asset state period, a new period is generated. This field is                       available when CPQ Plus, Salesforce Billing, or Subscription                       Management is enabled.

LocationId.description: ID of the GPS coordinates of the asset.

Longitude.description: Asset’s location. Typically, this location is the place where the                       asset is stored, such as a warehouse or van.

OwnerId.description: Asset’s owner. By default, the asset owner is the user who created                       the asset record.

PostalCode.description: Postal code in the asset address.

Product2Id.description: Optional. ID of Product2 related to this asset. Must be a valid                       Product2 ID.

ProductCode.description: Product code of the related product.

PurchaseDate.description: Date on which this asset was purchased.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type.

RootAssetId.description: Read-only. The top-level asset in an asset hierarchy. Depending on                       where an asset lies in the hierarchy, the asset’s root can be the                       same as the parent.

StockKeepingUnit.description: Stock keeping unit assigned to the related product.

Street.description: Street name in the asset address.

TotalLifecycleAmount.description: Total amount of revenue for the asset, including revenue from each                       stage in the asset lifecycle. The field is available when CPQ Plus,                       Salesforce Billing, or Subscription Management is enabled.

UsageEndDate.description: End date or expiry date for asset use.

cgcloud_Brand__c.description: References to the brand of the child product.

cgcloud_Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud_ERP_Asset_Number__c.description: Holds the asset number assigned by the ERP.

cgcloud_Manufacturer_Serial_Number__c.description: Serial number given by the manufacturer.

cgcloud_Ownership_Type__c.description: Indicates the ownership type of the asset:

cgcloud_Production_Year__c.description: Holds the production year of the asset.

cgcloud_Service_Phone_Number__c.description: Phone number from the service support of the asset.

cgcloud_Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the asset is valid.

cgcloud_Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the asset is valid.

Assortment.name: Assortment
Assortment.description: Represents a list of products that are eligible for sale in a store.

Description.description: User-defined description of an assortment of products.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: User-defined name of an assortment of products.

cgcloud__Description_Language_1__c.description: The description of language 1. This field is available in API version 55.0            and later.

cgcloud__Description_Language_2__c.description: The description of language 2. This field is available in API version 55.0            and later.

cgcloud__Description_Language_3__c.description: The description of language 3. This field is available in API version 55.0            and later.

cgcloud__Description_Language_4__c.description: The description of language 4. This field is available in API version 55.0            and later.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user specific            language.

cgcloud__Distribution__c.description: This field is not used in Consumer Goods Cloud.

cgcloud__Facings__c.description: This field is not used in Consumer Goods Cloud.

cgcloud__Listing_Module__c.description: Value of the Listing Module. This field is available in API version 55.0 and            later.

cgcloud__Obligatory__c.description: Denotes whether this is a closed listing. Used by the system.

cgcloud__Price_Survey__c.description: This field is not used in Consumer Goods Cloud.

cgcloud__Product_Assortment_Template__c.description: References to the name of product assortment template. This field is            available in API version 55.0 and later.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org which the product assortment belongs to. This field            is available in API version 55.0 and later.

cgcloud__Sync_Pending__c.description: Flagged to be relevant for this sync process. This field is available in API            version 55.0 and later.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: The starting date of the valid period for the Assortment. This field is            available in API version 55.0 and later.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: The end date of the valid period for the Assortment. This field is available            in API version 55.0 and later.

cgcloud__Version_Off_Platform_APL__c.description: Stores the off platform version number of Account product list. This field            is available in API version 55.0 and later.

cgcloud__Version__c.description: Stores the version number of Authorization list. This field is available in            API version 55.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

ProductId.description: ID of each product within the assortment.

cgc_sync__Sync_API_Log__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_API_Log__c
cgc_sync__Sync_API_Log__c.description: Stores performance information that's executed on synchronization          endpoints.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who created the log.

cgc_sync__Category__c.description: Stores the category of                       Key                       Performace Indicators (KPIs).

cgc_sync__Device_Id__c.description: ID of the device from which the log was created.

cgc_sync__Endpoint_Class_Name__c.description: Stores the                       Apex                       REST endpoints implementer class name.

cgc_sync__Input_Data_Volume__c.description: Stores the size and volume of input data for the measured task.                       For example, if you want to measure a named query execution, you                       can enter the number of characters in the SOQL string here.

cgc_sync__Measured_At__c.description: Stores the date and time when the measurement was performed for                       the KPI.

cgc_sync__Output_Data_Volume__c.description: Stores the size and volume of output data for the task that's                       measured (if applicable). For example, if you want to measure a                       named query execution, you can place in this field the number of                       records that the result set contains.

cgc_sync__Request_Id__c.description: Unique identifier that's generated once for each API call.

cgc_sync__SOQL_Statement__c.description: Stores the related SOQL statement that is measured, or set as a                       blank string when the KPI isn’t related to any specific SOQL                       statement.

cgc_sync__Subcategory__c.description: Stores the subcategory of the KPI.

cgc_sync__Sync_Id__c.description: Stores the unique ID of the sync request.

cgc_sync__Value__c.description: Stores the value of the KPI.

Name.description: Unique identification of the profile mapping.

cgc_sync__Client_App_Profile__c.description: Profile details of the client application.

cgc_sync__Mapped_Record_Id__c.description: ID of the record that's mapped to the sync configuration.

cgc_sync__Sync_Client_Registration__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Client_Registration__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Client_Registration__c.description: Stores the details of the Consumer Goods Cloud offline mobile app device that          a synchronization request to Salesforce is initiated from.

Name.description: Name of the sync client registry.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who sets up the configuration.

cgc_sync__Device_Id__c.description: Unique identifier of the device that initiates a synchronization                       request.

cgc_sync__Get_First_Sync_Request_Queue_T.description: Specifies the milliseconds of the first synchronization request                       to get a position in the sync queue.

cgc_sync__Last_Queue_Status_Request_At__.description: Timestamp of the last synchronization request.

cgc_sync__Sync_Action_Type__c.description: Type of the last initiated synchronization process.

Name.description: Name of the sync configuration file.

SetupOwnerId.description: ID of the owner who set up the configuration.

cgc_sync__Analyze_Threshold__c.description: Threshold value for DB analyze. Range:                          100-100000.

cgc_sync__Back_End_KPIs_Enabled__c.description: Indicates whether  the system                       allocates additional computational resources to gather performance                       statistics at                       run                       time (true)                       or not (false)..

cgc_sync__Batch_Soql_Heap_Size_Limit__c.description: Stores the batch SOQL heap size limit in milliseconds.

cgc_sync__Batch_Soql_Page_Size_Limit__c.description: Stores the batch SOQL page size limit in bytes.

cgc_sync__Batch_Soql_Response_Time_Limit.description: Batch SOQL response time in milliseconds. Recommended value:                          4000.Range:                             2000-4000.

cgc_sync__Business_Area_Mapping__c.description: Maps a field from the User entity to segregate data downloaded to                       a mobile device based on business area.

cgc_sync__CPU_Time_Calculation_Buffer__c.description: Buffer time in milliseconds that system includes when calculating                       CPU time limit to protect the system from Apex CPU time limit                       exceptions during sync processes. Recommended value:                          6500.

cgc_sync__ClientApp_ID__c.description: Installation ID or Client App ID of the device.

cgc_sync__Download_Heap_Size_Limit__c.description: Stores the download heap size limit in bytes.

cgc_sync__Download_Page_Size_Limit__c.description: Number of records to be processed inside an Apex endpoint until                       paging starts.

cgc_sync__Download_Response_Time_Limit__.description: Download response time in milliseconds. Recommended value:                          2000.Range:                          2000-4000.

cgc_sync__Encryption_Platforms__c.description: Comma-separated list of operating systems. For example, iOS and                       Android. These systems activate encryption.

cgc_sync__Event_Period_Length_Hours__c.description: Time period in hours for                       controlling                       the event's maximum quantity limitations.

cgc_sync__Ignore_Client_Overrides__c.description: Indicates whether ignores client overrides is active (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__Last_Generated_LU_Name__c.description: Last generated Logical Unit (LU) value generated in the back                       end.

cgc_sync__Max_Error_Events_Per_Period__c.description: Maximum number of error events that a device can send in a                       specified duration when you set the value of the log level field as                          Error.

cgc_sync__Max_Other_Events_Per_Period__c.description: Maximum number of events that a device can send in a specified                       duration when you set the log level field as Debug, Info, or Log.

cgc_sync__NFT_Heap_Size_Limit__c.description: Named Fetch Tree heap size in bytes. Range: 1048576 (1MB)                          - 6291456 (6MB). Recommended value: 5242500                          (5MB).

cgc_sync__NFT_Page_Size_Limit__c.description: Maximum allowed page size for Named Fetch Tree (in bytes). Range:                          1000 - 50000.

cgc_sync__NFT_Response_Time_Limit__c.description: NFT response time limit in                       milliseconds.                       Recommended value: 4000.

cgc_sync__Named_Query_Heap_Size_Limit__c.description: Named query heap size limit in bytes.

cgc_sync__Named_Query_Page_Size_Limit__c.description: Named query page size limit in bytes.

cgc_sync__Named_Query_Response_Time_Limi.description: Named query response time limit in bytes.

cgc_sync__Namespace_Macro__c.description: Contains the replacement key to the settings for the SOQL macro in                       the CG Cloud Synchronization namespace.

cgc_sync__SObject_Describe_Heap_Size_Lim.description: Heap size limit of sObject Describe in bytes.

cgc_sync__SObject_Describe_Response_Time.description: Response time limit of sObject Describe in milliseconds.

cgc_sync__Sync_At_App_Start__c.description: Determines how often the data sync is performed when the mobile                       app starts. Possible values are:

cgc_sync__Sync_Concurrent_Users_Limit__c.description: Maximum number of users that can simultaneously perform                       synchronization when the Queue sync users at maximum limit setting                       is enabled. Recommended value: 200Range:                             2-600.

cgc_sync__Sync_On_Online__c.description: Executes the last incomplete sync attempt and is triggered when an                       online connection is available. It mainly synchronizes the tracked                       objects.

cgc_sync__Sync_On_Resume__c.description: Executes the last incomplete sync and gets executed when the                       device resumes from the background. It mainly synchronizes the                       tracked objects.

cgc_sync__Sync_On_Startup__c.description: This synchronization option is triggered every time the                       application is launched. cgcloud__Fund__c.name: cgcloud__Fund__c
cgcloud__Fund__c.description: A fund is the amount of money that's given to an employee for a          special reason during a specific business period. This money is used to pay special          activities such as promotion campaigns.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Actual_RBF__c.description: Total Actual Rate Based Funding (RBF) that's calculated from Fund                       Grid.

cgcloud__Amount__c.description: Fund Amount - Sum of all Transaction.Amount from Transaction_Row                       (where Transaction_Row.Target_Fund = #Fund#).

cgcloud__Available_to_Plan__c.description: Represents the sum of the Pending Budget amount minus the Spending                       (Pending) amount.

cgcloud__Commitments_Total__c.description: Sum of Spending Committed and LE Spend Pending.

cgcloud__Current_Balance__c.description: Represents the sum of the Credit/Debit Balance (Approved) amount                       and the Actual RBF amount

cgcloud__Current_Budget__c.description: Represents the sum of the Current Balance amount and the Actual                       RBF amount.

cgcloud__Deposits_Approved__c.description: This field rolls up Fund transaction Rows in which the transaction                       type is Deposit.

cgcloud__Deposits_Pending__c.description: This field rolls up pending fund transactions (in which Target                       funds are credited) and sums up the approved amount of                       Deposits.

cgcloud__Deposits_Total__c.description: Sum of Approved Deposits and Pending Deposits.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description.

cgcloud__External_Id__c.description: External ID that's used to maintain unique fund records during                       data loads.

cgcloud__Fixed_Based_Overdraw__c.description: This field is used to make this calculation: Deposits (Approved) *                       (Fixed-Based Overdraw Allowance/100).

cgcloud__Fund_Template_Description__c.description: Stores the description of the selected fund template.

cgcloud__Invoice_Based_Costs__c.description: Sum of Tactic_Fund.OI_Costs_c of records whose Phase is                       Committed.

cgcloud__LE_RBF__c.description: Total LE RBF that's calculated from Fund Grid.

cgcloud__LE_Revenue__c.description: Total LE Revenue that's calculated from Fund Grid.

cgcloud__LE_Spend_Approved__c.description: Sum of Tactic_Fund.LE_Spend__c of records whose Phase is                       Committed.

cgcloud__LE_Spend_Pending__c.description: Sum of Tactic_Fund.LE_Spend__c of records whose Phase isn't                       Committed or Cancelled.

cgcloud__LE_Spend_Total__c.description: Sum of spend approved and spend pending.

cgcloud__LE_Volume__c.description: Total LE Volume that's calculated from Fund Grid.

cgcloud__Liabilities_Accrued__c.description: Sum of Tactic_Fund.Liabilities__c of records whose Phase is                       Committed.

cgcloud__Payments_Approved__c.description: Sum of all Payment_Tactic_Fund.Amount from Payment_Tactic_Fund                       (where Payment_Tactic_Fund.Payment_Status = Closed).

cgcloud__Payments_Pending__c.description: Sum of all Payment_Tactic_Fund.Amount from Payment_Tactic_Fund                       (where Payment_Tactic_Fund.Payment_Status <> Closed).

cgcloud__Payments_Total__c.description: Sum of approved payments and pending payments.

cgcloud__Payouts_Approved__c.description: Sum of the Payments (Approved) amount and the Invoice Based Costs                       amount.

cgcloud__Pending_Balance__c.description: Represents the sum of the Credit/Debit Balance (Pending) amount                       and the LE RBF amount.

cgcloud__Pending_Budget__c.description: Represents the sum of the Pending Balance amount and the Remaining                       RBF amount.

cgcloud__Product_Count__c.description: Usage in validation rule for one or more products in the related                       list when locking the fund.

cgcloud__RBF_Based_Overdraw__c.description: This field is to calculate: RBF (Remaining) * (RBF-Based Overdraw                       Allowance/ 100).

cgcloud__Remaining_RBF__c.description: Difference of LE RBF and Actual RBF.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org of the fund.

cgcloud__Spending_Committed__c.description: Sum of Tactic_Fund.LE_Spend__c of records whose Phase is Committed                       minus the sum of Payment_Tactic_Funds.Payment_Status__c of records                       whose Payments_Status__c is Closed.

cgcloud__Status__c.description: Determines the status of the fund.

cgcloud__Total_Available_Overdraw__c.description: This field is calculate: Fixed-Based Overdraw + RBF-Based                       Overdraw.

cgcloud__Total_Balance__c.description: Sum of the current balance and pending balance.

cgcloud__Total_Budget__c.description: Sum of the current budget and pending budget.

cgcloud__Total_Credits_Approved_Earned__.description: Represents the sum of the Deposits (Approved) amount and the                       Actual RBF amount.

cgcloud__Total_Credits_Pending_Estimated.description: Represents the sum of the Deposits (Pending) amount and the LE RBF                       amount.

cgcloud__Total_Debits_Approved__c.description: Represents the sum of the Withdraws/Payments (Approved) amount and                       the Invoice Based Costs amount.

cgcloud__Total_Debits_Pending__c.description: Represents the sum of the Withdraws/Payments (Pending) amount and                       the Invoice-Based Costs amount.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the fund is valid.

cgcloud__Withdraws_Approved__c.description: This field rolls up Fund transaction Rows for which transaction                       type is Withdraws.

cgcloud__Data_Source_BoM_Component_Sourc.description: Defines from which level the values are determined.

cgcloud__Data_Source_Condition_Search_Gr.description: Stores the group code of the condition search group.
References to the condition search group.

cgcloud__Data_Source_Consider_Product_Hi.description: Indicates whether the product hierarchy is considered for the                       condition search.

cgcloud__Data_Source_Load_For_Sub_Accoun.description: Defines whether the loaded data is anchored to the planning                       account or to a list of accounts (Sub accounts). This field is                       applicable only for Read type.

cgcloud__Data_Source_Measure_Code__c.description: Unique code of a data source measure.

cgcloud__Data_Source_Monthly_Table_Name_.description: Name of the source table for Monthly data that's to be read.

cgcloud__Data_Source_Table_Name__c.description: Name of the source table from which the measure data is                       drawn.

cgcloud__Data_Source_Week_Offset__c.description: Data is fetched from the database for the timeframe that lies                       within this number of weeks before the promotion. This field is                       supported only for volume data.

cgcloud__Data_Source_Year_Offset__c.description: Number of years to go back in time. The data is fetched from the                       database for the timeframe that lies within this number of years                       that can be either one or two years before the promotion. This                       field is applicable only for Read type. It can't be used in                       combination with week offset for one KPI at the same time.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Display_Enabled__c.description: Only the measures whose display is enabled are to be displayed on                       the UI.

cgcloud__Display_Round__c.description: UI Rounding determines the number of decimal places that are to be                       shown in the cell.

cgcloud__Distribution_Acc_Hierarchy_Dist.description: Measure code defines the code that's used to distributevalues down                       the account hierarchy.

cgcloud__Distribution_Acc_Hierarchy_Metr.description: The                       measure code defines the code that is used for distribution of                       values down the account hierarchy.

cgcloud__Distribution_Order__c.description: Defines the order in which hierarchies are traversed.

cgcloud__Distribution_Plan_Hierarchy_Dis.description: Reference to the KPI definition when distribution is of plan                       hierarchy.
Defines the distribution type that's to be used to distribute                       values down the planning hierarchy.

cgcloud__Distribution_Time_Hierarchy_Dis.description: Reference to the KPI definition when distribution is of time                       hierarchy.
Defines the distribution type that's to be used to distribute                       values down the time hierarchy.

cgcloud__Editable_Edit_Mode__c.description: This field is for lump sum. After this field is enabled and when a                       user introduces a total, the totals don't change even if other                       items change (KPI, products, and so on).

cgcloud__Editable_Enable_Past_Weeks__c.description: If true, the cells of past weeks remain editable.

cgcloud__Editable_Fixed_Totals__c.description: Defines whether the non-obsolete last edited or calculated total                       value of the KPI is saved for use in the Promotion                       Calculation.

cgcloud__Editable_Measure_Code__c.description: Unique code of the editable measure that's used when saving the                       edit history.

cgcloud__Is_Storage_Level_Bom_Component_.description: Flag that indicates whether the KPI Definition Storage Levels is                       BOM Component.

cgcloud__Parent__c.description: Reference to the Compound KPI to which this KPI belongs.

cgcloud__Reporting_Formula__c.description: Defines the calculation rule for calculated reporting KPIs as a                       JavaScript formula.

cgcloud__Reporting_Relevant__c.description: Defines whether the KPI is relevant for reporting.

cgcloud__Reporting_Type__c.description: Controls whether the KPI is either directly read from the                       Writeback measure or calculated.

cgcloud__Rounding_Order__c.description: Period Then Sub Periods method rounds period values first, and                       then rounds the buckets. This ensures that their merged value                       matches the period value. Sub Periods Then Period rounds subperiods                       first, and then merges them into periods.

cgcloud__Rounding_Precision__c.description: Defines the precision to which the calculation engine rounds the                       calculated values of the KPI at product level such that these                       values aggregate up to the correct weekly, monthly, and total                       values without losing precision.

cgcloud__Rounding_Type__c.description: Rounding With Carry Over is a special configuration that uses a                       carryover from one cell to another to ensure that aggregations and                       totals match with the rounded number. Rounding Enabled performs a                       simple rounding to the nearest number.

cgcloud__Scope__c.description: Defines the object scope of the KPI. The KPI can be added to the                       relevant KPI Set based on the defined scope.

cgcloud__Storage_Options_Measure_Code__c.description: Unique code of the writeback measure that's used when writing back                       KPIs. The last character may be a # for KPIs with the object scope                       as Payment Tactic.

cgcloud__Storage_Options_Storage_Levels_.description: Levels on which the data is written back. More than one level can                       be defined.

cgcloud__Storage_Options_Subperiod__c.description: If active, writeback has to generate daily accurate values for the                       subperiods that belong to different months.

cgcloud__Storage_Options_Writeback__c.description: Rows with writeback as true are saved back to the database for                       further use by external tools.

cgcloud__Time_Granularity__c.description: If granularity is Subperiod, the formula is applied at the                       subperiod level and then merged by using merge rule. In Period                       granularity, the formula is applied over already merged                       values.

cgcloud__Time_Scope__c.description: Consideration of time ranges within the calculation.

cgcloud__Total_Calculation_Cumulative__c.description: Specifies whether the KPI is a cumulative KPI.

cgcloud__Order_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Order_Template__c
cgcloud__Order_Template__c.description: Template that controls the behavior of a sales document.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Attribute that's used to either enable or disable the current                       template.

cgcloud__Add_Former_Items__c.description: Template setting controls whether items, which belong to a former                       sales document of the same business partner and of the same sales                       document template, are to be added to the disposal list. The system                       considers only sales documents that have reached a status of status                       type as Ready within the number of days specified in                       SdoMeta.ConsiderMaxHistoryDays.

cgcloud__Add_Items_Json__c.description: JSON to customize the Add Items page.

cgcloud__Allow_Competitor_Products__c.description: Controls whether foreign products can be used in the sales                       document.

cgcloud__Allow_Header_Discount__c.description: Indicates if a user can provide a discount for the order. The app                       evaluates the discount percentage or amount from the valid pricing                       conditions for the order.

cgcloud__Barcode_Scan_Behavior__c.description: Controls the behavior of barcode scanning of products: Select an                       item, and then increase the product quantity.

cgcloud__Can_Purchase_Number_Update_Allo.description: Indicates whether the driver is allowed to update the purchase                       number while reviewing the delivery document.

cgcloud__Calculation_Schema__c.description: Reference to the calculation schema that determines the                       calculation schema that's used in truck load documents.

cgcloud__Cancel_Reason_Required__c.description: Indicates whether cancel reasons are required.

cgcloud__Check__c.description: Controls whether the delivery date is to be checked.

cgcloud__Check_Out_Type__c.description: Order is used for the inventory check-out.

cgcloud__Compute_Price__c.description: Controls whether prices are computed for the items.

cgcloud__Consider_Field_Availability__c.description: Template setting controls whether the field state is to be                       considered when adding a product to the disposal list.

cgcloud__Consider_History_In_Days__c.description: Controls the number of days that are to be used to determine a                       last item.

cgcloud__Consider_Inventory__c.description: Determines the products in the item list based on existing user                       inventories.

cgcloud__Consider_Lead_Time__c.description: Indicates whether the lead time is taken from the delivery                       recipient. Otherwise, the lead time of this template is taken. The                       maximum lead time is defined in both cases by the template.

cgcloud__Consider_Listing__c.description: All products of active listings are considered according to the                       specified listing finding template.

cgcloud__Consider_Modification_Reason__c.description: Specifies whether modification reasons can be entered for modified                       items.

cgcloud__Consider_OoS__c.description: The system adds out-of-stock products to the disposal list and/or                       presets their quantity.

cgcloud__Consider_Promotion__c.description: All products whose state is active and executable are considered                       according to the specified promotion finding template.

cgcloud__Consider_Quantity_Suggestion__c.description: Presetting of the ordered quantity via either the calculated                       quantity suggestion or preordered quantity.

cgcloud__Consider_Saturday__c.description: If 1 (true): deliveries on Saturdays are allowed.

cgcloud__Consider_Stock__c.description: Specifies whether the current stock is to be considered for                       quantity suggestion in the web display of the disposal list.                       Currently, it's additionally used to display the current stock in                       the disposal list of the Mobility device.

cgcloud__Consider_Sunday__c.description: If 1 (true): deliveries on Sundays are allowed.

cgcloud__Creation_Platform__c.description: Indicates the platform on which this template can be used to                       create sales documents.

cgcloud__Customer_Selling_Assortment__c.description: Controls whether the customer selling assortment is used to preset                       the disposal list. - 0/No: The system doesn't consider any customer                       selling assortment. - 1/Yes: The system filters the disposal list                       subject to the customer selling assortment. All other template                       attributes for the disposal list control are to be considered                       also.

cgcloud__Deletion_Allowed__c.description: Defines whether it’s allowed to delete any object of the                       template.

cgcloud__Delivery_Date_Calculation__c.description: Controls how the delivery date is determined.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specifiied language.

cgcloud__Disposal_List_Proposal__c.description: Controls whether and how the disposal list is built for this                       sales document template.

cgcloud__Document_Transaction_Type__c.description: Specifies how to manage a sales document regarding payments.

cgcloud__Document_Type__c.description: Specifies how to handle a sales document regarding payments.

cgcloud__Flat_Item_List_Grouping__c.description: When displaying the disposal list as a flat list on the Mobility                       device, the items are to be grouped in accordance with the product                       groups of the specified level.

cgcloud__Free_Items_Json__c.description: JSON to customize the Free Items page.

cgcloud__Generate_Pricing_Information__c.description: Controls the storage of pricing information in the respective                       order item/order object. And these pricing details are shown during                       printing or print preview.

cgcloud__Generate_Pricing_Log__c.description: Controls whether the pricing engine writes or synchronizes pricing                       logs.

cgcloud__Generate_Rewards_Log__c.description: This attribute can be used by users to switch on/off the                       generation of the Rewards log file when the order is saved.

cgcloud__Hide_Wholesaler__c.description: Controls whether the attribute Broker/Wholesaler is hidden in the                       UI.

cgcloud__Id_Generation__c.description: Controls the behavior of the document number generation.

cgcloud__Max_Order_Value__c.description: Maximum order value that's accepted for orders of this                       template.

cgcloud__Min_Lead_Time__c.description: Number of minimum days needed to process the order and prepare the                       delivery.

cgcloud__Mobility_Relevant__c.description: Controls the validation of restrictions that are necessary for                       usage on mobility devices.

cgcloud__Notify_Outdated_Calculation__c.description: Controls whether the system issues a warning message about an                       outdated complex pricing calculation when opening the order.

cgcloud__Number_Of_Historic_Quantities__.description: Number of historical orders that are to be considered for quantity                       suggestion.

cgcloud__Sales_Document_Assortment__c.description: Controls whether the sales document template assortment is used to                       preset the disposal list. - 0/No: The system doesn't consider any                       sales document template assortment. - 1/Yes: The system presets the                       disposal list subject to the sales document template assortment.                       All other template attributes for the disposal list control have to                       be considered also.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org to which the order template belongs.

cgcloud__Selling_Assortment_Filter__c.description: Controls whether the customer selling assortment is to be                       considered when validating the disposal list. No: The system                       doesn't consider any customer selling assortment. Yes: The system                       filters the disposal list subject to the customer selling                       assortment. The validation verifies the assignment of each product                       to the according assortment.
