Category.description: Category of similar in-store location types across a store group.

InStoreLocationType.description: Type of  in-store location. Most retail stores have similar layouts and have            common in-store location types.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LocationId.description: ID of the GPS coordinates of the retail store.

Name.description: User-defined name of the in-store location.

PlanogramId.description: Planogram image associated with the in-store location.

RetailStoreId.description: ID of the store associated with the location.

Operatinghours.name: Operatinghours
Operatinghours.description: Standard and custom fields extend the standard Operating hours object          in Consumer Goods Cloud to represent the hours in which a service territory, service          resource, or account is available for work.

Description.description: Description of the operating hours. Add any details that aren’t                       included in the name.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date when the operating hours record was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: Date when the operating hours record was last viewed.

Name.description: Name of the operating hours. For example, Summer Hours, Winter Hours, or Peak Season Hours.

TimeZone.description: Time zone which the operating hours fall within:

OtherComponentTask.name: OtherComponentTask
OtherComponentTask.description: Represents the details of a component task performed in a visit. A component       task allows customers to launch components from the task framework.

FullyQualifiedName.description: Name of the task prefixed with the namespace. For example, a component xyz            in the c namespace must be named as c__abc.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the component task record owner.

ParentTaskId.description: Assessment task associated with the component task.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The participant role that's associated with the task.

Product2.name: Product2
Product2.description: Represents a product that your company sells. Custom fields extend the          standard Product object for use in Consumer Goods Cloud.

Description.description: A text description of this record. Label is Product                          Description.

DisplayUrl.description: URL leading to a specific version of a record in the linked                       external data source.

ExternalDataSourceId.description: ID of the related external data source.

ExternalId.description: The unique identifier of a record in the linked external data                       source. For example, ID #123.

Family.description: Name of the product family associated with this record.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this record is active (true) or not (false). Inactive Product2 records are                       hidden in many areas in the user interface. You can change the                          IsActive flag on a Product2 object as often                       as necessary. Label is Active.

IsArchived.description: Indicates whether the product is archived.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this object.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       object.

Name.description: Required. Default name of this record. Label is Product                          Name.

ProductCode.description: Default product code for this record. Your org defines the product                       code naming pattern.

QuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of the product; for example, kilograms, liters, or cases.                       This field comes with only one value (Each) so consider creating your own. The                          QuantityUnitOfMeasure field on ProductItem                       inherits this field’s values.

RecordTypeId.description: Indicates the record type of the record.

StockKeepingUnit.description: The SKU for the product. Use in tandem with or instead of the                          ProductCode field. For example, you can                       track the manufacturer’s identifying code in the Product Code field                       and assign the product a SKU when you resell it.

cgcloud__Bill_Of_Material_Header_Code__c.description: Holds the Header code of the product, if it is a BOM component.                       For standard products the field will be empty.

cgcloud__Category__c.description: Indicates the product category that this product record is                       referring to.

cgcloud__Competitive_Product__c.description: Marks a product as a competitor's product.

cgcloud__Consumer_Goods_Product_Code__c.description: Stores the unique identification of a product.

cgcloud__Container_Size_Unit__c.description: Describes the unit of a container size.

cgcloud__Container_Size__c.description: Describes the numeric value for container size.

cgcloud__Container_Type__c.description: Describes the type of container of the product.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_0__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_1__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_2__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_3__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_4__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_5__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_6__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_7__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_8__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criteria_Text_9__c.description: Holds the Criteria in a text form.

cgcloud__Criterion_1_Product__c.description: References the product in the hierarchy of the product which is on                       Product_Level 'Category'.

cgcloud__Criterion_2_Product__c.description: References the product in the hierarchy of the product which is on                       Product_Level 'SubCategory'.

cgcloud__Criterion_3_Product__c.description: References the product in the hierarchy of the product which is on                       Product_Level 'Brand'.

cgcloud__Criterion_4_Product__c.description: References the product in the hierarchy of the product which is on                       Product_Level 'Flavor'.

cgcloud__Criterion_5_Product__c.description: References the product in the hierarchy of the product which is on                       Product_Level 'Package'.

cgcloud__Criterion_6_Product__c.description: References the product in the hierarchy of the product which is on                       Product_Level 'Product'.

cgcloud__Custom_Sort__c.description: Use to customize the sorting order of the products. Is                       unique.

cgcloud__Description_1_Language_1__c.description: Holds the first description of language 1.

cgcloud__Description_1_Language_2__c.description: Holds the first description of language 2.

cgcloud__Description_1_Language_3__c.description: Holds the first description of language 3.

cgcloud__Description_1_Language_4__c.description: Holds the first description of language 4.

cgcloud__Description_1__c.description: Description 1 based on the user specific language.

cgcloud__Description_2_Language_1__c.description: Holds the second description of language 1.

cgcloud__Description_2_Language_2__c.description: Holds the second description of language 2.

cgcloud__Description_2_Language_3__c.description: Holds the second description of language 3.

cgcloud__Description_2_Language_4__c.description: Holds the second description of language 4.

cgcloud__Description_2__c.description: Description 2 based on the user specific language.

cgcloud__Estimated_Value__c.description: Holds the estimated value of the asset.

cgcloud__Fund_Valid_From__c.description: Fund Role status valid from date.

cgcloud__Fund_Valid_Thru__c.description: Fund Role status valid thru date.

cgcloud__GTIN__c.description: Universal Product Number (UPC) number of the product.

cgcloud__Height__c.description: Holds the height of the asset.

cgcloud__Is_Bill_Of_Material_Label__c.description: Defines a secondary label for the Is_Bill_Of_Material__c field.

cgcloud__Is_Bill_Of_Material__c.description: Boolean flag to identify BOM products.

cgcloud__KAM_Product__c.description: References to the specifics for a product on the lowest level of                       the product hierarchy, which is the corresponding product on                       planning level (Product Price Group level).

cgcloud__New_Item_Valid_From__c.description: New Item status valid from date.

cgcloud__New_Item_Valid_Thru__c.description: New Item status valid thru date.

cgcloud__Order_Ability__c.description: This is an "apex roll up summary field" to identify the Order able                       products only. Order Able products are identified by the units of                       measure which have Order Ability set to true.

cgcloud__Pack_Size_Unit__c.description: Unit of the product pack size.

cgcloud__Pack_Size__c.description: Numeric value for the product pack size.

cgcloud__Power_Supply_Connected__c.description: Specifies whether the asset requires connection to a power                       supply.

cgcloud__Product_Form__c.description: Defines the state of the product.

cgcloud__Rounding_Rule_Validation__c.description: This is an "apex roll up summary field". Internally required.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org which the product belongs to.

cgcloud__Sell_In_Code__c.description: Holds the Sell In Code of the product.

cgcloud__Sell_Out_Code__c.description: Holds the Sell Out Code of the product.

cgcloud__Short_Description_Language_1__c.description: Holds the short description of language 1.

cgcloud__Short_Description_Language_2__c.description: Holds the short description of language 2.

cgcloud__Short_Description_Language_3__c.description: Holds the short description of language 3.

cgcloud__Short_Description_Language_4__c.description: Holds the short description of language 4.

cgcloud__Short_Description__c.description: Short description based on the user specific language.

cgcloud__Size__c.description: Holds the size of the asset.

cgcloud__Transfer_Record_Identifier__c.description: Identifies the products for the promotion transfer process.

cgcloud__Weight__c.description: Holds the weight of the asset.

Promotion.name: Promotion
Promotion.description: Create promotional activities that are either part of a campaign or isolated       targeted promotions to run at retail stores.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the promotion is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Level.description: Level at which a promotion is applicable.

Objective.description: Business objective of the promotion. For example, launching a new product,            keeping customers satisfied, or clearing stock.

OwnerId.description: ID of the promotion record owner.

PromotionChannel.name: PromotionChannel
PromotionChannel.description: Associate a promotion with a store, store group, or an account.

AccountId.description: ID of the account with which the promotion is associated.

EndDate.description: Final date that the association of the promotion with the stores is            valid.

InStoreLocationId.description: ID of the in-store location that’s associated with the promotion.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion with which the store is associated.

RetailLocationGroupId.description: ID of the retail store group with which the promotion is associated.

RetailStoreId.description: ID of the retail store with which the promotion is associated.

StartDate.description: First date that the association of the promotion with the stores is            valid.

PromotionProduct.name: PromotionProduct
PromotionProduct.description: Associate a promotion with a product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the association of a product and a promotion.

ProductId.description: ID of the product with which the promotion is associated.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion with which the product is associated.

PromotionProductCategory.name: PromotionProductCategory
PromotionProductCategory.description: Associate a promotional activity with a product category.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the association of a product category and a            promotion.

ProductCategoryId.description: ID of the product category with which the promotion is associated.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion with which the product category is associated.

RetailLocationGroup.name: RetailLocationGroup
RetailLocationGroup.description: Group retail stores based on shared features, such as size, location, part of a       retail chain.

Description.description: User-defined description of the store group.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: User-defined name of the store group.

OwnerId.description: ID of the retail store group record owner.

RetailStore.name: RetailStore
RetailStore.description: Create records for physical retail stores associated to business accounts.

AccountId.description: ID of the parent account to which the retail store belongs.

Address.description: Address of the retail store. This field is available in API version 51.0 and            later.

City.description: City where the retail store is located. This field is available in API            version 51.0 and later.

Country.description: Country where the retail store is located. This field is available in API            version 51.0 and later.

DeliveryFrequency.description: The number of times orders are delivered to the store with the specified            frequency type.

DeliveryFrequencyType.description: The frequency at which orders are delivered to the store.

DeliveryMethod.description: The method used for delivering orders to the store.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: Geocode for the retail store. This field is available in API version 51.0            and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Latitude.description: Latitude of the retail store. This field is available in API version 51.0            and later.

LocationId.description: Identifier of a retail store’s geographical location.

Longitude.description: Longitude of the retail store. This field is available in API version 51.0            and later.

OperatingHoursId.description: ID of the store operating hours.

OwnerId.description: ID of the retail store record owner.

PaymentMethod.description: Method of payment used for transactions of orders.

PostalCode.description: Postal code of the retail store address. This field is available in API            version 51.0 and later.

PreferredVisitHoursId.description: ID of the preferred hours for store visits.

PrimaryContactId.description: Name of the store manager that is associated with the account.

RecommendedVisitFrequenc.description: The recommended number of store visits.
The recommended frequency type for store visits.

RetailLocationGroupId.description: ID of the store group with which the store is associated.

State.description: State where the retail store is located. This field is available in API            version 51.0 and later.

StoreType.description: Type of the store. This value is used when setting up policies for the            store.

Street.description: Street where the retail store is located. This field is available in API            version 51.0 and later.

RetailStoreGroupAssignment.name: RetailStoreGroupAssignment
RetailStoreGroupAssignment.description: Represents a junction between a retail store and a retail store group.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Currency used for a retail store.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

PriorityOrder.description: The order in which a store and store group assignment takes                       precedence over another assignment of the same store to another                       store group.

RetailLocationGroupId.description: The retail store group associated with the record.

RetailStoreId.description: The retail store associated with the record.

RetailStoreKpi.name: RetailStoreKpi
RetailStoreKpi.description: Map store groups to assessment indicator definition, products, and in-store       location categories and define targets. Targets are the expected compliance values for each       assessment indicator definition, which is a parameter based on which markers of compliance are       decided for a task.

AssessmentIndDefinitionI.description: ID of the assessment indicator definition to track, such as inventory or            facings.

CustomContextId.description: ID of the custom object if the assessment indicator definition is associated            for a custom task.

EndDate.description: Final date of the association between a store group and the assessment            indicator definitions.

InStoreLocationCategory.description: ID of the in-store location category.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the retail store assessment indicator definition record owner.

PlanogramId.description: ID of the planogram if the assessment task is planogram check.

ProductCategoryId.description: ID of the product category, if the promotion level is for a product category            and the assessment task is a promotion check.

ProductId.description: Product for which the assessment indicator definition is tracked.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion if the assessment indicator definition is for a            promotion check.

RetailStoreGroupId.description: ID of the retail store group for which the assessment indicator definition            is defined.

StartDate.description: Start date of the association between a store group and the assessment            indicator definitions.

TargetBooleanValue.description: The expected value among the two possible ones for the measuring            parameter.

TargetDateTimeValue.description: The expected date and time for the measuring parameter.

TargetDecimalValue.description: The expected fractional value for the measuring parameter.

TargetIntegerValue.description: The target whole number value for the measuring parameter.

TargetStringValue.description: The expected sequence of characters for the measuring parameter.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The unit used to measure the assessment indicator definition.

RetailVisitKpi.name: RetailVisitKpi
RetailVisitKpi.description: Capture the actual information during a visit against the defined assessment       indicator definition and target values.

ActualBooleanValue.description: The actual one of two possible values for an assessment indicator definition            that the sales rep can capture during the store visit audit.

ActualDateTimeValue.description: The actual date and time for an assessment indicator definition that the            sales rep can capture during the store visit audit.

ActualDecimalValue.description: The actual fractional value for an assessment indicator definition that the            sales rep can capture during the store visit audit.

ActualIntegerValue.description: The actual whole number value for an assessment indicator definition that            the sales rep can capture during the store visit audit.

ActualStringValue.description: The actual sequence of characters for an assessment indicator definition            that the sales rep can capture during the store visit audit.

AssessmentIndDefinitionI.description: The assessment indicator definition ID that indicates the kind of parameter            that is audited. Values can include: Inventory, Facings, Competitor Facings,            Share of Shelf.

AssessmentTaskId.description: ID of the assessment task against which the actual data is captured.

CustomContextId.description: ID of the custom object if the assessment indicator definition is associated            for a custom task.

DisplayOrder.description: Sequence in which the retail visit KPI must be displayed. This field is            available in API version 51.0 and later.

InStoreLocationId.description: ID of the in-store location that is associated with the assessment indicator            definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the visit KPI.

PrimaryDisplayOrder.description: Sequence in which products, product categories, promotions, or other            contexts are displayed for an assessment task. This field is available in API            version 53.0 and later.

ProductCategoryId.description: ID of the product category for which audit is done.

ProductId.description: ID of the product for which the assessment indicator definition is            tracked.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion if the assessment task is a promotion check.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type.

TargetBooleanValue.description: The expected value among the two possible ones for an assessment indicator            definition against which the actual value is captured.

TargetDateTimeValue.description: The expected date and time for an assessment indicator definition against            which the actual value is captured.

TargetDecimalValue.description: The expected fractional for an assessment indicator definition against which            the actual value is captured.

TargetIntegerValue.description: The expected whole number value for an assessment indicator definition            against which the actual value is captured.

TargetStringValue.description: The expected sequence of characters for an assessment indicator definition            against which the actual value is captured.

Type.description: Type of the assessment indicator definition.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure for the combination of assessment indicator definition            type and target value.

Shift.name: Shift
Shift.description: Represents a shift for service resource scheduling.

BackgroundColor.description: Sets a background color when shifts are displayed in the UI. Use a 3- or 6-digit hexadecimal format, for example #FF00FF. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

EndLocation.description: Captures the user’s geolocation at the end of the shift.

EndTime.description: The date and time that the shift ends.

GeoFnLcTypeAtShftEnd.description: Specifies the allowed location type for geofence validation at the end of the shift.

GeoFnLcTypeAtShftStart.description: Specifies the allowed location type for geofence validation at the start of the shift.

GeoFnNotificationType.description: Specifies the notification type for geofence validation at the start and end of the shift.

IsGeoFnRqrAtShftEnd.description: Indicates whether geofencing was enabled at the end of the shift.

IsGeoFnRqrAtShftStart.description: Indicates whether geofencing was enabled at the start of the shift.

IsGeoLcRqrAtShftEnd.description: Indicates whether user's geolocation was captured at the end of the shift.

IsGeoLcRqrAtShftStart.description: Indicates whether user's geolocation was captured at the start of the shift.

IsHolidayShift.description: Indicates a shift that overlaps with holiday hours. The default value is false. Available in API version 55.0 and later.

IsNonStandard.description: Indicates whether the shift is nonstandard, such as overtime or on-call shifts.

IsOsidGeoFnRngAtShftEnd.description: Indicates whether the shift was ended outside the allowed distance between the user's GPS location and the geofence end location (true) or not (false).

IsOsidGeoFnRngAtShftStart.description: Indicates whether the shift was started outside the allowed distance between the user's GPS location and the geofence start location (true) or not (false).

JobProfileId.description: The job profile associated with the shift. Available in API versions 47.0 and later.

Label.description: The label that a shift is given.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the current user last viewed a related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the current user last viewed this record.

NotificationTypeAtShftEnd.description: Specifies the notification type for open tours at the end of the shift.

RecordsetFilterCriteriaId.description: The ID of the recordset filter criteria selected for the shift. Available in API version 49.0 and later.

ServiceResourceId.description: The ID of the service resource the shift belongs to. Available in API versions 47.0 and later.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The ID of the service territory the shift belongs to. Available in API versions 47.0 and later.

ShiftNumber.description: The number automatically given to the shift upon creation.

ShiftTemplateId.description: The shift template ID, if the shift was created from a shift template. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

ShouldAutoEnd.description: Indicates whether the shift was automatically ended when the tour was completed.

ShouldAutoStart.description: Indicates whether the shift was automatically started when the tour began.

StartLocation.description: Captures the user’s geolocation at the start of the shift.

StartTime.description: The date and time that the shift starts.

Status.description: The current status of the shift.

StatusCategory.description: Specifies the status of the shift using static values. This field is derived from Status using the mapping defined in setup.

TimeSlotType.description: Type of time slot for the shift. The same setup values as the TimeSlot field in the OperatingHours object.

UserId.description: The user assigned to the shift.

ShiftTemplate.name: ShiftTemplate
ShiftTemplate.description: Represents a template for creating shifts.

BackgroundColor.description: Sets a background color when shifts are displayed in the UI. Use a                       3- or 6-digit hexadecimal format, for example #FF00FF. Available in                       API version 54.0 and later.

Description.description: Additional information about the shift like number of breaks or                       activities.

Duration.description: How long the shift lasts. The unit of measurement for this field                       is determined by                       ShiftTemplateDurationType.

GeoFnLcTypeAtShftEnd.description: Specifies the allowed location type for geofence validation at the                       end of the shift.

GeoFnLcTypeAtShftStart.description: Specifies the allowed location type for geofence validation at the                       start of the shift.

GeoFnNotificationType.description: Specifies the notification type for geofence validation at the                       start and end of the shift.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the shift is active or inactive.

IsGeoFnRqrAtShftEnd.description: Indicates whether geofencing was enabled at the end of the                       shift.

IsGeoFnRqrAtShftStart.description: Indicates whether geofencing was enabled at the start of the                       shift.

IsGeoLcRqrAtShftEnd.description: Indicates whether user's geolocation was captured at the end of                       the shift.

IsGeoLcRqrAtShftStart.description: Indicates whether user's geolocation was captured at the start of                       the shift.

IsNonStandard.description: Indicates whether the shift is nonstandard, such as overtime or                       on-call shifts.

JobProfileId.description: The Job Profile record. This field is optional.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the shift template was last modified. Its label in                       the user interface is Last Modified                       Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the shift template was last viewed.

NotificationTypeAtShftEnd.description: Specifies the notification type for open tours at the end of the                       shift.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the shift template.

RecordsetFilterCriteriaId.description: The ID of the recordset filter criteria selected for the shift                       template. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

ShiftTemplateDurationType.description: The unit of measurement for the shift template duration.

ShouldAutoEnd.description: Indicates whether the shift was automatically ended when the tour                       was completed.

ShouldAutoStart.description: Indicates whether the shift was automatically started when the                       tour began.

StartTime.description: The time of day when the shift starts.

TimeSlotType.description: The type of time slot. Possible values are:                          Normal                           Extended                         You can use Extended to represent                       overtime shifts. Available in API version 55.0 and later.

StoreActionPlanTemplate.name: StoreActionPlanTemplate
StoreActionPlanTemplate.description: Associate an action plan template with a store.

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: ID of an action plan template item that is associated with a retail            store.

EndDate.description: Final date of the association between an action plan template and a            store.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

StartDate.description: Start date of the association between an action plan template and a            store.

StoreId.description: ID of the retail store for which the action plan template is defined.

StoreAssortment.name: StoreAssortment
StoreAssortment.description: Associate an assortment to either a store, a store group, or an account.

AccountId.description: ID of the account which the retail store is part of.

AssortmentId.description: ID of the assortment with which the store is associated.

EndDate.description: Date when the assortment stops being applicable to the store.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RetailStoreId.description: ID of the store with which the assortment is associated.

StartDate.description: Start date of applicability of the assortment to a store, store group, or            an account.

cgcloud_Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the store assortment record.

StoreProduct.name: StoreProduct
StoreProduct.description: Associate a product to a retail store or to a specific in-store location.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the record. This field is available in API            versions 52.0 and later.

DisplayOrder.description: Sequence in which a product must be displayed for a retail store. This field            is available in API version 53.0 and later.

EndDate.description: Final date when the association of product to an in-store location, store,            store group, or account is applicable.

InStoreLocationId.description: ID of the in-store location to which the product is associated.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the association of a store and product.

OwnerId.description: ID of the store product record owner.

ProductId.description: ID of the product associated with the retail store.

RetailStoreId.description: ID of the retail store with which the product is associated.

StartDate.description: First date that the association of product to an in-store location, store,            store group, or account is applicable.

Task.name: Task
Task.description: Standard and custom fields extend the standard Task object in          Consumer Goods Cloud to represent business activities, which are Task and Event records,          such as making a phone call.

ActivityDate.description: Due date of the task. Has a timestamp that’s always set to                       midnight in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone. The                       timestamp is irrelevant. Don’t alter the time zone to accommodate                       time zone differences.   Note You can’t set or update the field for                          a recurring task (IsRecurrence is true).

CallDisposition.description: Result of a given call. For example, call unsuccessful. Can have                       up to 255 characters.

CallDurationInSeconds.description: Duration of the call in seconds.

CallObject.description: Name of a call center. Can have up to 255 characters.

CallType.description: Type of call that’s being answered:

CompletedDateTime.description: Date and time that the task was saved with a Closed status:                          For insert, if the task is saved with a Closed status, the                             field is set. If the task is saved with an Open status, the                             field is set to NULL.                            For update, if the task is saved with a new Closed status,                             the field is reset.

IsArchived.description: Indicates whether the event has been archived.

IsClosed.description: Indicates whether the task has been completed (true) or not (false).

IsHighPriority.description: Indicates a high-priority task. The field is derived from the                          Priority field.

IsRecurrence.description: Indicates whether the task is scheduled to repeat itself (true) or only occurs one time                          (false). Read-only on                       update, but not on create. If this field value is true, then always populate                          RecurrenceStartDateOnly,                          RecurrenceEndDateOnly,                          RecurrenceType, and any recurrence fields                       related to the given recurrence type. See Recurring Tasks.

IsReminderSet.description: Indicates whether a pop-up reminder has been set for the task                          (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: ID of the User or Group who owns the record.

Priority.description: Required. Indicates the importance or urgency of a task:

RecordTypeId.description: Type of the record.

RecurrenceActivityId.description: Read-only. Not required on create. ID of the main record of the                       recurring task. Subsequent occurrences have the same value in the                       field.

RecurrenceDayOfMonth.description: Day of the month in which the task repeats.

RecurrenceDayOfWeekMask.description: Day or days of the week on which the task repeats:

RecurrenceEndDateOnly.description: Indicates the last date on which the event repeats. For multiday                       Salesforce Classic recurring events, this date is the day on which                       the last occurrence starts. This field is a date field with a                       timestamp that’s always set to midnight in the Coordinated                       Universal Time (UTC) time zone. Don’t attempt to alter the                       timestamp to accommodate time zone differences.

RecurrenceInstance.description: Indicates the frequency of the Salesforce Classic event’s                       recurrence:

RecurrenceInterval.description: Indicates the interval between Salesforce Classic recurring                       events.

RecurrenceMonthOfYear.description: Indicates the month in which the Salesforce Classic recurring                       event repeats:

RecurrenceRegeneratedType.description: Initiates the repetition of a repeating task:

RecurrenceStartDateOnly.description: Date when the recurring task begins. Must be a date and time                       before RecurrenceEndDateOnly.

RecurrenceTimeZoneSidKey.description: Time zone associated with the recurring task.

RecurrenceType.description: Indicates how often the task repeats:

ReminderDateTime.description: Time when the reminder is scheduled to initiate, if                          IsReminderSet is set to true. If                          IsReminderSet is set to false, then the user probably                       deselected the reminder option in the Salesforce user interface, or                       the reminder was already initiated at the time indicated by the                       value.

Status.description: Required. Indicates the status of the task:

Subject.description: Subject line of the task, such as Call or Send Quote. Can have up                       to 255 characters.

TaskSubtype.description: Standard subtypes to facilitate creating and searching for                       specific task subtypes:

WhatId.description: Represents nonhuman objects, such as accounts, opportunities,                       campaigns, cases, or custom objects. Polymorphic (equivalent to the                       ID of a related object) relationship field.

WhoId.description: Represents a human, such as a lead or a contact. Polymorphic                       (equivalent to a contact’s ID or a lead’s ID) relationship field.

cgcloud__Check_Overlap__c.description: Indicates whether to check for overlaps while creating calls. If                       this option is selected, the system checks if a current visit                       overlaps with other visits. Only visits in Planned state are                       considered.

User.name: User
User.description: Standard and custom fields extend the standard User object for use in          Consumer Goods Cloud to represent a user in your company.

AboutMe.description: Information about the user, such as areas of interest or skills.                       This field is available even if Chatter is disabled.

AccountId.description: ID of the Account associated with a Customer Portal user.

Address.description: Read-only. Compound form of the address. See Address Compound Fields                       for details on compound address fields.

Alias.description: Required. User’s alias. For example, jsmith.

BadgeText.description: Experience Cloud site role shown on the user profile page.

BannerPhotoUrl.description: URL for the user's banner photo.

CallCenterId.description: If Salesforce CRM Call Center is enabled, represents the call                       center that the user is assigned to.

City.description: City associated with the user. Can have up to 40 characters.

CommunityNickname.description: Name used to identify the user in the Experience Cloud site.

ContactId.description: ID of the Contact associated with this account. The Contact must                       have a value in the AccountId field, or an                       error occurs.

Country.description: Country associated with the user. Can have up to 80 characters.

DefaultGroupNotificationFrequency.description: Required. The default frequency for sending the user's Chatter                       group email notifications when the user joins groups:

DelegatedApproverId.description: ID of the user who’s a delegated approver for this user.

Department.description: Company department associated with the user.

DigestFrequency.description: Required. Send frequency of the user’s Chatter personal email                       digest:

Division.description: Division associated with this user, similar to Department, and                       unrelated to DefaultDivision.

EmailEncodingKey.description: Required. Email encoding for the user:

EmailPreferencesAutoBcc.description: Determines whether the user receives copies of sent emails. This                       option applies only if compliance BCC emails aren’t enabled.

FederationIdentifier.description: Indicates the value that must be listed in the Subject element of a Security                       Assertion Markup Language (SAML) IDP certificate to                       authenticate the user for a client application using single                       sign-on. This value must be specified if the SAML User ID Type is                       Assertion contains Federation ID from the User record. Otherwise,                       this field can’t be edited.

ForecastEnabled.description: Indicates whether the user is enabled as a forecast manager                          (true) or not (false). Forecast managers see                       forecast rollups from users below them in the forecast hierarchy.

FullPhotoUrl.description: URL for the user's profile photo. This field is available even if                       Chatter is disabled. The URL is updated every time a photo is                       uploaded and reflects the most recent photo. If a newer photo is                       uploaded, the URL returned for an older photo isn’t guaranteed to                       return a photo. Query this field for the URL of the most recent                       photo.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates                       compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically                       provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude                       coordinates.

IndividualId.description: ID of the data privacy record associated with this user. This                       field is available if Data Protection and Privacy is enabled.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the user has access to log in (true) or not (false). You can modify a user's                       active status from the user interface or via the API.

IsProfilePhotoActive.description: Indicates whether a user has a profile photo (true) or not (false).

JigsawImportLimitOverride.description: Data.com users’ monthly addition limit. The value must be between                       zero and the organization’s monthly addition limit.

LastLoginDate.description: Date and time when the user last logged in successfully. This                       value is updated if 60 seconds elapses after the user’s last login.

LastPasswordChangeDate.description: Date when the last password changed or reset.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp of when the current user last viewed a record related to                       this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp of when the current user last viewed this record. If                       this value is null, this record was probably referenced                          (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the geolocation of an address.                       Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90, up to 15 decimal                       places. For details on geolocation compound fields, see Compound Field Considerations and                          Limitations.

LocaleSidKey.description: Required. Restricted picklist field whose values are named based                       on the language and the country, if necessary, using two-letter ISO                       codes:

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the geolocation of an address.                       Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180, up to 15                       decimal places. For details on geolocation compound fields, see                          Compound Field Considerations and                          Limitations.

ManagerId.description: The ID of the user who manages this user.

MediumBannerPhotoUrl.description: The URL for the medium-sized user profile banner photo.

Name.description: Concatenation of FirstName and                          LastName. Limited to 203 characters,                       including whitespaces.

NumberOfFailedLogins.description: The number of failed login attempts for the user’s account. When                       the maximum number of failed login attempts is reached, the counter                       resets and the user’s account is locked. If there’s a successful                       login before the maximum number of failed login attempts is                       reached, the counter resets and the user’s account remains                       unlocked.

OfflinePdaTrialExpirationDate.description: The date and time when the Sales Anywhere trial expires.

OfflineTrialExpirationDate.description: The date and time when the user’s Connect Offline trial expires.

PostalCode.description: The user’s postal or ZIP code.

ProfileId.description: Required. ID of the user’s Profile. Use this value to cache                       metadata based on profile. In earlier releases, this was RoleId.

ReceivesAdminInfoEmails.description: Indicates whether the user receives email for administrators from                       Salesforce (true) or not                          (false).

ReceivesInfoEmails.description: Indicates whether the user receives informational email from                       Salesforce true) or not                          (false).

SenderEmail.description: The email address used as the From address when the user sends                       emails. This address is the same value shown in Setup on the My                       Email Settings page.

SenderName.description: The name used as the email sender when the user sends emails. This                       name is the same value shown in Setup on the My Email Settings                       page.

Signature.description: The signature text added to emails. This text is the same value                       shown in Setup on the My Email Settings page.

SmallBannerPhotoUrl.description: The URL for the small user profile banner photo.

SmallPhotoUrl.description: The URL for a thumbnail of the user's profile photo. This field is                       available even if Chatter is disabled.

State.description: The state associated with the User. Up to 80 characters allowed.

Street.description: The street address associated with the user.

TimeZoneSidKey.description: Required. This field is a restricted picklist field. A User time                       zone affects the offset used when displaying or entering times in                       the user interface. But the API doesn’t use a User time zone when                       querying or setting values.

Title.description: User’s business title. For example, Vice President.

UserType.description: Type of user who can access the record:

cgcloud__Language_Postfix__c.description: You can define up to 4 languages per sales org.

cgcloud__Mobility_Sales_Org__c.description: Mobility Sales org of the users mobile app:

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org of the template:

VehicleUserAssignment.name: VehicleUserAssignment
VehicleUserAssignment.description: Represents the assignment of a vehicle to a driver. Vehicle is a moving       location.

ActualEndDateTime.description: The            actual            end time of the assignment.

ActualStartDateTime.description: The actual start time of a driver's association with a vehicle.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

PlannedEndDateTime.description: The planned end time of a driver's association with a vehicle.

PlannedStartDateTime.description: The planned start time of a driver's association with a vehicle.

Status.description: The status of a vehicle assignment.

Visit.name: Visit
Visit.description: Track information related to a field rep’s visit to a retail store where they       perform retail activities.

AccountId.description: The account that is associated with a visit. This field is available in API            versions 48.0 and later.

ActualVisitEndTime.description: The date and time when the visit ended.

ActualVisitStartTime.description: The date and time when the visit started.

AddressId.description: The address of the retail store where the visit must be conducted. This            field is available in API versions 52.0 and later. Not applicable for the            enhanced model of Consumer Goods cloud.

cgcloud__Account_City__c.description: City of the related account. This is a calculated field.

cgcloud__Account_Street__c.description: Street name of the related account.

cgcloud__Accountable__c.description: The accountable user for this visit. System sets the initiator of the visit            as the initial accountable user.

cgcloud__Creation_Date_and_Time__c.description: Date and time the visit was created.

cgcloud__Creation_Mode__c.description: Specifies the way the visit was created. Possible values are manually or            automatic. The default value is manually.

cgcloud__Date_mock__c.description: Help/Mock field to visualize calendar in visual force page. Value of this            field won't be saved in the database.

cgcloud__Distribution_Rate_All__c.description: Distribution rate of all products. The system calculates and stores            the 'Distribution Rate of All Products' (DRallP) as percentage value.

cgcloud__Distribution_Issue__c.description: This is a KPI Field calculated based on the distribution rate of all            products. The system caluclates and stores the 'Distribution Issues' (DI) as            boolean value.

cgcloud__Duration_Effective__c.description: Effective visit duration captured via time tracking. Only implemented in            mobile, will remain empty if visit is completed on desktop.

cgcloud__Duration_In_Minutes__c.description: Planned duration of the visit (difference between planned start and end            data). This is a calculated field.

cgcloud__End_Date__c.description: Planned end date of the visit.

cgcloud__Fixed_Visit_Date__c.description: Specifies that this visit was scheduled with the customer at a fixed date            and time. Attribute can be used to implement a logic which will not allow to            move the visit to a different date or time. Possible values are 0 (No) and 1            (Yes). The default value is 0.

cgcloud__Geolocation__c.description: Geo coordinates (Latitude  and Longitude) of the position from the user            taken on the mobile device during the visit completion or cancellation.

cgcloud__IsAllDayEvent__c.description: Visit is planned for the entire day. Weekly calendar visualizes such visits            in the header of the day. The default value is false.

cgcloud__Is_Vst_Cmpl_Osid_Range__c.description: Indicates whether the visit completed outside the allowed distance between            the GPS location and the store’s geolocation.

cgcloud__Is_Vst_Start_Osid_Range__c.description: Indicates whether the visit started outside the allowed distance between the            GPS location and the store’s geolocation.

cgcloud__Note__c.description: Visit notes which can be captured to prepare the visit or during execution            time.

cgcloud__Start_Date__c.description: Planned start date of the visit.

cgcloud__Start_Geolocation__c.description: Customer’s location coordinates (latitude and longitude) at the start of a            visit.

cgcloud__Subject_Formula__c.description: This field is required when subject needs to be displayed in a formula            format. This is a calculated field.

cgcloud__Visit_Template__c.description: Template of the visit. This field is a relationship field.

ContactId.description: The person to contact at the retail store during a visit. This field is            available in API versions 52.0 and later. Not applicable for the enhanced            model of Consumer Goods cloud.

ContextId.description: The purpose of a visit, such as claim, business license application, or work            type. This field is available in API versions 48.0 and later. Not applicable            for the enhanced model of Consumer Goods cloud.

InstructionDescription.description: Special instructions provided by a sales manager or an admin that a sales            rep refers to during a visit. Not applicable for the enhanced model of            Consumer Goods cloud.

LastModifiedById.description: User who last modified the visit.

LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time of the last modification for this visit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LocationId.description: The location of the retail store where visit must be conducted. This field            is available in API versions 52.0 and later.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the visit record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the visit record owner.

PlaceId.description: ID of the place that sales reps visit.

PlannedVisitEndTime.description: The date and time when the visit is expected to end.

PlannedVisitStartTime.description: The date and time when the visit is expected to start.

RetailStoreId.description: The retail store where the visit is conducted. This field is available in            API versions 52.0 and later. Used in CG Cloud base model to assign a retail            store. Not applicable for the enhanced model of Consumer Goods cloud.

Status.description: The status of the visit. Sales reps’ can’t edit this field.

StatusRemarks.description: The reasons for abandoning or completing the visit as provided by the sales            rep. Not applicable for the enhanced model of Consumer Goods cloud.

VisitorId.description: ID of the sales representative visiting the store. Not applicable for the            enhanced model of Consumer Goods cloud.

VisitedParty.name: VisitedParty
VisitedParty.description: Represents the contact person at the account that’s being visited.

ContactId.description: Lookup to the person assigned as the contact at an account. This field            references the Contact object.

IsPrimaryContact.description: Indicates whether the person is the primary visited party.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the visited party.

VisitId.description: Lookup to the Visit record this person            is associated with.

Visitor.name: Visitor
Visitor.description: Represents the sales reps performing visits.

AssigneeId.description: Lookup to the person assigned as the visitor. This fields references the              User, ServiceResource, and Contact            objects.

IsPrimaryResource.description: Indicates whether the visitor is the primary visitor for a visit.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the user is a required visitor for the visit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

VisitId.description: Lookup to the Visit record this visitor            is associated with.
